description: This will be the home of the next generation of slide authoring presentation for [Jupyter Notebooks](https://github.com/jupyter/notebook).
name: nbpresent

scripts.all: npm run dist && npm run lint && npm run test && npm run docs
scripts.docs: npm run docs:clean && npm run docs:esdoc && npm run docs:sphinx && npm run docs:notebooks
scripts.docs:sphinx: sphinx-apidoc -f -o ./sphinx/source/auto nbpresent && cd sphinx && make html && mv -f build/html ../nbpresent/static/docs/sphinx
scripts.lint: npm run lint:eslint && npm run lint:flake8
scripts.pkg:conda: conda build conda.recipe -c javascript -c mutirri -c cpcloud -c anaconda-nb-extensions -c bokeh -c wakari
scripts.pkg:pypi: python setup.py register -r pypitest && python setup.py sdist && python setup.py bdist_wheel && python setup.py sdist upload -r pypitest && python setup.py bdist_wheel upload -r pypitest
scripts.pkg:pypi:release: python setup.py register -r pypi && python setup.py sdist && python setup.py bdist_wheel && python setup.py sdist bdist_wheel upload -r pypi
scripts.readme: jupyter nbconvert notebooks/README.ipynb --to=rst --stdout > README.rst && jupyter nbconvert notebooks/README.ipynb --to=markdown --stdout > README.md
